content: Look up the title "Prom Dress Rugby UCLA" on youtube and you'll see this year's Prom Dress Rugby. Now I know that there's a bunch of you kilt-wearers out there that are intrigued, yet somehow saddened, that it's women's rugby.

title: Prom Dress Rugby
